record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="config" and term="UNIX printer configuration" and format.name="config.printer" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: config - UNIX printer configuration - config.printer - en
record.file.name: config
record.format.name: config.printer

brief.brief: Use this form to maintain UNIX printer records.
There must always be a record, with a configuration item name of "sysprint.unix" in this table. Service Manager uses this configuration item as the default UNIX system printer.

For other printers, the configuration item name field should contain the name to assign to any new printer you add to the config table. You can enter this name into an operator record so that an operator's reports print on that new printer. You can also enter it when reports run, to indicate the printer on which to print the report.

detail.detail: The option read or write should contain the first character of the option either (r) or (w).
